name: ruTorrent
short_description: Lightweight torrent client with web interface for managing downloads.
description: Lightweight torrent client with web interface for managing downloads. ruTorrent is a self-hosted application focused on torrent, download, p2p, self-hosted. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host ruTorrent on your home server to lightweight torrent client with web interface for managing downloads without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use ruTorrent to manage your torrent workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
